item.description: A floating stage anchored behind the Boston Harbor Hotel at Rowes Wharf provides the setting for some of the hottest local and national blues artists. Songs from legends such as Marvin Gaye, Al Green, James Brown, Otis Redding, Roberta Flack and Gladys Knight & the Pips are brought to you live under the stars. Jeff Pitchell will perform from 6:00 to 10:00 on Thursday, August 13, 2009.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Blues Barge at the Boston Harbor Hotel
